headline: Jim Cramer on Solstice: “That’s a Cheap Stock”
summary: Solstice Advanced Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:SOLS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer mentioned in his latest comments. Cramer mentioned the stock during the episode and said: “Again, you only need to get rich once.
